topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0: OpenStack Kilo Features

section.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0 Kilo Features
section.p: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0 Core features are enabled by default and supported by HP.

HP Helion OpenStack 2.0 Non-core services are provided as-is and supported on a best-effort basis only, but are provided in this release to provide early access to features that HP may support fully in future releases, as well as legacy features that OpenStack is planning to deprecate but may be needed in the short-term for compatibility reasons. If you need additional support on any of these features for a specific use case, please contact HPâ€™s professional services team.

section.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0 Neutron Non-Core Features
section.p: The Non-Core Features provided in this list can be turned on but are not enabled by default. HP Helion OpenStack engineering supports these features.

ul.li:
Networking API v2 extensions
metering
networks multiple provider extension
MTU
Centralized routers as tenant router default
